categories: Category:Military units and formations of the Imperial Navy (Sith Empire)

nodes.text: The Fifth Naval Patrol Group was a division of the Imperial Navy of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, the entire patrol group was wiped out by its own droids operating under Directive 7; the Empire found the corpses of all 1,239 servicemen orbiting in perfect rings around the star Aduba.
